word_mean: 适当，足够，充足：处于特定目的下的充分状态

sentence.Network_en: I am very critical of the adequacy of Britain's race laws.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对英国种族法律的适当性颇有微词。

sentence.Network_en: He doubted her adequacy for the job.
sentence.Network_cn: 他怀疑她能否胜任这项工作.

sentence.Network_en: Several studies point to a real cause for concern over the adequacy of the diet eaten by British children.
sentence.Network_cn: 针对英国儿童膳食质量的担忧，数份研究将矛头指向了同一根源。

...内控，内部控制是内生基础，提高透明度，信息披露是必要手段，[2]信托公司监管评级分为，公司治理，内部控制，合规性，资产管理，盈利能力，商业银行CAMELS要素评级法，资本充足(capital adequacy)，资产质量(asset quality)，管理水平(management quality)，盈利性(earnings)，流动性(liquidity)，对市场风险的敏感度(sensitivity to market risk).

entry.def: Adequacy is the quality of being good enough or great enough in amount to be acceptable.

example.ex: I am very critical of the adequacy of Britain's race laws...
example.tran: 我对英国种族法律的适当性颇有微词。

example.ex: Several studies point to a real cause for concern over the adequacy of the diet eaten by British children.
example.tran: 针对英国儿童膳食质量的担忧，数份研究将矛头指向了同一根源。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being able to meet a need satisfactorily: "he questioned the adequacy of the usual sentimental interpretation of the Golden Rule"
2. the quality of being sufficient for the end in view;

sentences.sentence: "he questioned the sufficiency of human intelligence"

auth_sentence.content: The adequacy of the much simpler Newtonian calculations.

auth_sentence.content: It has all the properties Einstein sought for in his unified field theories except for total empirical adequacy.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强+equ相等,平均+ate……的→和所需的趋向相等

stems_affixes.value_cn: 稳定的,不变的,[脾气]温和的
stems_affixes.word_buile: equ相等,平均+able……的→[心情]能稳定的
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于
ad加强+equ相等,平均+acy状态→[数量]已经加到相等了→够了
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
stems_affixes.word_buile: equal[adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于]+ity表名词→n.同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
equate[v.同等看待,使相等]+ion表名词→n.[数学]等式,方程式;[with]相等;均衡
equ相等,平均+ity表名词→n.公平,公正
equ平等+anim生命+ity表名词→生命平等→平静

equ相等,平均+ate表动词→v.同等看待,使相等
